content: I am so sorry that the system failed you and your wife so badly. I believe we need to exercise some very tough love to dramatically increase the number of donors, by making everyone ineligible to receive an organ unless they have themselves been registered as a donor for at least 5 years. If we communicated this message loud and clear at every opportunity (when people get drivers licenses, register to vote, etc.), I believe we could have 10 or 20 times as many donors within a few years.
